titleStmt.title: An hymen[aea]n essay, or, An epithalamy upon the royall match of ... Charles the Second, with the most illustrious Katharine, Infanta of Portugall, 1662 by J.D.
titleStmt.author: J. D. (John Drope), 1626-1670.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Drope. Cf. BM.
Place of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
